title: Bacterial diversity, antibiogram and nutritional assessment of cowhide (Ponmo) in Ilishan-Remo central market, Nigeria

Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Mensah-Agyei Grace Oluwatoyin, Adaramola Feyisara Banji, Akpan Nevillah Nice, Egbeobawaye Jennifer Orobosa, Akeredolu Abosede Abolanle, Enitan Seyi Samson, Ajibade Oluwatosin
